channel.title: Vote4cash command of some sort?
channel.description:
basicly i was wondering if there was a command that would able players to vote and receive and award at the end, been searching on the internet for hours and can't seem to find a guide that will accually check whether the player has voted then once the server has that conformation the player can do ::claim or something because they could just cheat the system.
im using a 637 source And am a bit familier with coding (not the best but i know my way around)
thanks in advance to anyone who can help me!
